body.p: An Organization in Content Fusion is a workspace that groups users and their content.

When you first access Content Fusion, the Welcome page offers choices to:
Create a new organization - Allows you to set up a new organization as its administrator (if you do not already belong to one).
Access an existing organization - Allow you to access an existing organization by using one of these methods:
Selecting it from your list of recently accessed organizations.
Entering the organization's ID.
Entering your email address.
